Instance.description: Define how Sims put down an object.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: A list of interactions that should be considered to be an alternative to putting the object down.

TunableVariant.name: floor_cost
TunableVariant.description: The base cost used to compare putting an object on the ground with other options.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The base cost used to compare putting an object on the ground with other options.

TunableVariant.name: ideal_slot_type_set
TunableVariant.description: If specified, this set of slots will have the cost specified in the 'preferred_slot_cost' field in put_down_tuning. This allows us to tell Sims to weight specific slot types higher than others when considering where to put down this object.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: If specified, this set of slots will have the cost specified in the 'preferred_slot_cost' field in put_down_tuning. This allows us to tell Sims to weight specific slot types higher than others when considering where to put down this object.

TunableVariant.name: inventory_cost
TunableVariant.description: Cost for how likely a sim puts the object in their inventory instead of putting it down.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Cost for how likely a sim puts the object in their inventory instead of putting it down.

TunableVariant.name: normal_slot_cost
TunableVariant.description: Base score for a slot that this object does not prefer.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Base score for a slot that this object does not prefer.

TunableVariant.name: object_inventory_cost
TunableVariant.description: Base cost for a sim putting the object in a valid object inventory.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Base cost for a sim putting the object in a valid object inventory.

TunableVariant.name: preferred_slot_cost
TunableVariant.description: Base cost for a slot that this object prefers.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Base cost for a slot that this object prefers.

Tunable.name: put_down_on_terrain_facing_sim
Tunable.display: Put Down On Terrain Facing Sim
Tunable.description: If true, the object will face the Sim when placing it on terrain. Guitars and violins will enable this so they don't pop 180 degrees after the Sim puts it down.

Tunable.name: putdown_near_carry_cancellation_target
Tunable.description: If true, the object will be put down near the carry cancellation target. For example, if we run 'take a shower' interaction while holding an object, by default we put down the object near the carrier sim, but if this tuning is true, we will put the object near the shower stall.
